GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
ksmbd: fix reference count leak in smb_check_perm_dacl()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 9758a6653c27867d810de02b4e5697163dda9883, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 777cad1604d68ed4379ec899d1f7d2f6a29f01f0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ksmbd: fix reference count leak in smb_check_perm_dacl()
